meanings.sent1: The car hit a bump, causing a jor.

meanings.definition: A person who is very enthusiastic or energetic.
meanings.sent1: Sarah is a real jor when it comes to sports.
meanings.sent2: The team captain is the biggest jor on the field.

meanings.sent5: The jor of the group, always full of energy and ideas.
